a techniqu for softwar modul specif with exampl thi paperpresent an approach to write specif for part of softwarsystem the main goal is to provid specif suffici precisand complet that other piec of softwar can be writtento interact with the piec specifi without addit inform thesecondari goal is to includ in the specif no moreinform than necessari to meet the first goal the techniquis illustr by mean of a varieti of exampl froma tutori system cacm mai 1972 parna d l softwarspecif modul softwar engin softwar design 4 0 4 294 9 ca720504 jb januari 31 1978 10 47 am1542 4 2356 1683 4 2356 1693 4 2356 17814 2356 1787 4 2356 1836 4 2356 1945 42356 2042 4 2356 2060 4 2356 2061 4 23562082 4 2356 2091 4 2356 2152 4 2356 21794 2356 2222 4 2356 2340 4 2356 2356 42356 2356 4 2356 2356 4 2356 2420 4 23562546 4 2356 2603 4 2356 2679 4 2356 26984 2356 2708 4 2356 2824 4 2356 2844 42356 2874 4 2356 2972 4 2356 2982 4 23562986 4 2356 3045 4 2356 3093 4 2356 31434 2356 970 5 2356 1491 5 2356 2227 52356 2356 5 2356 2356 5 2356 2356 5 23562704 5 2356 2738 5 2356 2866 5 2356 28695 2356 2941 5 2356 2958 5 2356 3004 52356 3030 5 2356 1247 6 2356 1425 6 23561471 6 2356 1552 6 2356 1749 6 2356 17496 2356 2080 6 2356 2247 6 2356 2247 62356 2247 6 2356 2356 6 2356 2356 6 23562356 6 2356 2356 6 2356 2356 6 2356 23566 2356 2356 6 2356 2356 6 2356 2379 62356 2436 6 2356 2456 6 2356 2457 6 23562558 6 2356 2597 6 2356 2651 6 2356 26516 2356 2673 6 2356 2777 6 2356 2796 62356 2958 6 2356 2972 6 2356 3186 6 2356
